amendment.description: Amendment increases the appropriation for activities under Section 107 for community development grants for minority-serving institutions and Historically Black Colleges and Universities by $10 million. Subsequently, the account for reverse mortgages would be decreased by $10 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 11 printed in Part A of House Report 111-578 to increase by $10 million activities under Section 107, under the Community Development Grant program at HUD. Specifically additional funding would be requested for the HBCU Community Development Grant Program. Subsequently, reverse mortgages would be decreased by $10 million.

action.text: Amendment (A010) offered by Ms. Johnson, E. B..

vote.text: On agreeing to the Johnson, E. B. amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
